name: Wheeli Bot
description:
Information

Wheeli Bot is a 2D Platformer created for the #CrunchlessChallenge. You play as a robot that can switch between walking with his legs, or move with the wheel on his head.  The goal is to collect all 118 coins and avoid the enemies.

The Windows version is not codesigned and I have not tested it on Windows. So I don't know if it will work right.

Made with Godot Game Engine.

Credits

SFX Made by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment, the pack I used is here.

Music Made by Abstaction Music, the pack I used is here.

Original Background by Anisimuz, the pack I used is here.

Godot LICENSE HERE.
